475 template<class IntegralType>
476 RCP<StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> >
477  DummyObjectGetter<StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> >::getDummyObject()
478 {
479  return stringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>(
480  tuple<std::string>(""), tuple<std::string>(""),
481  tuple<IntegralType>((IntegralType)1), "");
482 }

499 class TEUCHOS_LIB_DLL_EXPORT AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator
500  : public ParameterEntryValidator
501 {
502 public:
503 
506 
508  enum EPreferredType { PREFER_INT, PREFER_DOUBLE, PREFER_STRING };
509 
510 
512  class AcceptedTypes {
513  public:
515  AcceptedTypes( bool allowAllTypesByDefault = true )
516  :allowInt_(allowAllTypesByDefault),allowDouble_(allowAllTypesByDefault),
517  allowString_(allowAllTypesByDefault)
518  {}
520  AcceptedTypes& allowInt( bool _allowInt )
521  { allowInt_ = _allowInt; return *this; }
523  AcceptedTypes& allowDouble( bool _allowDouble )
524  { allowDouble_ = _allowDouble; return *this; }
526  AcceptedTypes& allowString( bool _allowString )
527  { allowString_ = _allowString; return *this; }
529  bool allowInt() const { return allowInt_; }
531  bool allowDouble() const { return allowDouble_; }
533  bool allowString() const { return allowString_; }
534  private:
535  bool allowInt_;
536  bool allowDouble_;
537  bool allowString_;
538  };

626  EPreferredType getPreferredType() const;
627 
629  static const std::string&
630  getPrefferedTypeString(EPreferredType enumValue)
631  {
632  switch(enumValue){
633  case PREFER_INT:
634  return getIntEnumString();
635  break;
636  case PREFER_DOUBLE:
637  return getDoubleEnumString();
638  break;
639  case PREFER_STRING:
640  return getStringEnumString();
641  break;
642  default:
643  static const std::string typeString(toString(enumValue));
644  throw std::runtime_error("Cannot convert enumValue: " + typeString + " to a string");
645  //Should never get here. This code is here so that a warning is not generated.
646  return typeString;
647  }
648  }
649 
651  static EPreferredType getPrefferedTypeStringEnum(const std::string& enumString)
652  {
653  if(enumString == getIntEnumString()){
654  return PREFER_INT;
655  }
656  else if(enumString == getDoubleEnumString()){
657  return PREFER_DOUBLE;
658  }
659  else if(enumString == getStringEnumString()){
660  return PREFER_STRING;
661  }
662  else{
663  throw std::runtime_error("Cannot convert enumString: " + enumString + " to an enum");
664  }
665  //Should never get here. This code is here so that a warning is not generated.
666  return (EPreferredType)-1;
667  }
668 
670 
673 
675  const std::string getXMLTypeName() const;

680  std::ostream & out

713 #ifdef _MSC_VER
714 #pragma warning(push)
715 #pragma warning(disable:4251)
716 #endif
717  const AcceptedTypes acceptedTypes_;
718 #ifdef _MSC_VER
719 #pragma warning(pop)
720 #endif
721 
722  // ////////////////////////////
723  // Private member functions
724 
725  /* \brief Gets the string representing the "int" preferred type enum */
726  static const std::string& getIntEnumString(){
727  static const std::string intEnumString_ = TypeNameTraits<int>::name();
728  return intEnumString_;
729  }
730 
731  /* \brief Gets the string representing the "double" preferred type enum */
732  static const std::string& getDoubleEnumString(){
733  static const std::string doubleEnumString_ = TypeNameTraits<double>::name();
734  return doubleEnumString_;
735  }
736 
737  /* \brief Gets the string representing the "string" preferred type enum */
738  static const std::string& getStringEnumString(){
739  static const std::string stringEnumString_ = TypeNameTraits<std::string>::name();
740  return stringEnumString_;
741  }

904 template <class T>
905 struct UndefinedEnhancedNumberTraits{
907  static inline T notDefined() {
908  return T::this_type_is_missing_a_specialization();
909  }
910 };
911 
912 
933 template <class T>
934 class EnhancedNumberTraits{
935 public:
936 
938  static inline T min()
939  { return UndefinedEnhancedNumberTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
940 
942  static inline T max()
943  { return UndefinedEnhancedNumberTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
944 
947  static inline T defaultStep()
948  { return UndefinedEnhancedNumberTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
949 
952  static inline unsigned short defaultPrecision()
953  { return UndefinedEnhancedNumberTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
954 
955 };
956 
957 
958 template<>
959 class EnhancedNumberTraits<short int>{
960 public:
961  static inline short int min() { return std::numeric_limits<short int>::min(); }
962  static inline short int max() { return std::numeric_limits<short int>::max(); }
963  static inline short int defaultStep() { return 1; }
964  static inline unsigned short defaultPrecision() { return 0; }
965 };
966 
967 
968 template<>
969 class EnhancedNumberTraits<short unsigned int>{
970 public:
971  static inline short unsigned int min() { return std::numeric_limits<short unsigned int>::min(); }
972  static inline short unsigned int max() { return std::numeric_limits<short unsigned int>::max(); }
973  static inline short unsigned int defaultStep() { return 1; }
974  static inline unsigned short defaultPrecision() { return 0; }
975 };
976 
977

982  static inline int max() { return std::numeric_limits<int>::max(); }
983  static inline int defaultStep() { return 1; }
984  static inline unsigned short defaultPrecision() { return 0; }

1063 
1069 template <class T>
1070 class EnhancedNumberValidator : public ParameterEntryValidator{
1071 
1072 public:
1073 
1076 
1091  EnhancedNumberValidator(
1092  T min,
1093  T max,
1094  T step=EnhancedNumberTraits<T>::defaultStep(),
1095  unsigned short precision=EnhancedNumberTraits<T>::defaultPrecision()):
1096  ParameterEntryValidator(),
1097  minVal(min), maxVal(max), step_(step), precision_(precision),
1098  containsMin(true), containsMax(true){}
1099 
1103  EnhancedNumberValidator():
1104  ParameterEntryValidator(),
1105  minVal(EnhancedNumberTraits<T>::min()),
1106  maxVal(EnhancedNumberTraits<T>::max()),
1107  step_(EnhancedNumberTraits<T>::defaultStep()),
1108  precision_(EnhancedNumberTraits<T>::defaultPrecision()),
1109  containsMin(false),
1110  containsMax(false){}
1111 
1113 
1115 
1116 
1121  void setMin(T min){
1122  minVal = min;
1123  containsMin = true;
1124  }
1125 
1130  void setMax(T max){
1131  maxVal = max;
1132  containsMax = true;
1133  }
1134 
1139  void setStep(T step){
1140  step_ = step;
1141  }
1142 
1147  void setPrecision(unsigned short precision){
1148  precision_ = precision;
1149  }
1150 
1152 
1155 
1160  T getMin() const{
1161  return minVal;
1162  }
1163 
1168  T getMax() const{
1169  return maxVal;
1170  }
1171 
1176  T getStep() const{
1177  return step_;
1178  }
1179 
1184  unsigned short getPrecision() const{
1185  return precision_;
1186  }
1187 
1189 
1191 
1192 
1197  bool hasMin() const{
1198  return containsMin;
1199  }
1200 
1205  bool hasMax() const{
1206  return containsMax;
1207  }
1208 
1210 
1213 
1215  ValidStringsList validStringValues() const{
1216  return null;
1217  }
1218 
1220  void validate(ParameterEntry const &entry, std::string const &paramName,
1221  std::string const &sublistName) const;
1222 
1224  const std::string getXMLTypeName() const{
1225  return "EnhancedNumberValidator(" + TypeNameTraits<T>::name()+ ")";
1226  }
1227 
1229  void printDoc(std::string const &docString, std::ostream &out) const{
1230  StrUtils::printLines(out,"# ",docString);
1231  out << "#\tValidator Used: " << std::endl;
1232  out << "#\t\tNumber Validator" << std::endl;
1233  out << "#\t\tType: " << Teuchos::TypeNameTraits<T>::name() <<
1234  std::endl;
1235  out << "#\t\tMin (inclusive): " << minVal << std::endl;
1236  out << "#\t\tMax (inclusive): " << maxVal << std::endl;
1237  }
1238 
1240 
1241 private:
1242 
1245 
1248  T minVal;
1249 
1252  T maxVal;
1253 
1256  T step_;
1257 
1261  unsigned short precision_;
1262 
1265  bool containsMin;
1266 
1269  bool containsMax;
1270 
1272 
1273 };
1274 
1275 template<class T>
1276 void EnhancedNumberValidator<T>::validate(ParameterEntry const &entry, std::string const &paramName,
1277  std::string const &sublistName) const
1278 {
1279  any anyValue = entry.getAny(true);
1280  const std::string &entryName = entry.getAny(false).typeName();
1281 
1282  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(anyValue.type() != typeid(T),
1283  Exceptions::InvalidParameterType,
1284  "The \"" << paramName << "\"" <<
1285  " parameter in the \"" << sublistName <<
1286  "\" sublist is has an error." << std::endl << std::endl <<
1287  "Error: The value that you entered was the wrong type." << std::endl <<
1288  "Parameter: " << paramName << std::endl <<
1289  "Type specified: " << entryName << std::endl <<
1290  "Type accepted: " << Teuchos::TypeNameTraits<T>::name() << std::endl);
1291 
1292  bool isValueInRange;
1293  any_cast<T>(anyValue) >= minVal && any_cast<T>(anyValue) <= maxVal
1294  ? isValueInRange = true : isValueInRange=false;
1295  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!(isValueInRange),
1296  Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue,
1297  "The \"" << paramName << "\"" <<
1298  " parameter in the \"" << sublistName <<
1299  "\" sublist is has an error." << std::endl << std::endl <<
1300  "Error: The value that was entered doesn't fall with in " <<
1301  "the range set by the validator" << std::endl <<
1302  "Parameter: " << paramName << std::endl <<
1303  "Min: " << minVal << std::endl <<
1304  "Max: " << maxVal << std::endl <<
1305  "Value entered: " <<
1306  (any_cast<T>(anyValue)) << std::endl << std::endl);
1307 }
1308

1328 };

1335 }

1619 template<class ValidatorType, class EntryType>
1620 class TwoDArrayValidator : public AbstractArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType>{
1621 public:
1624 
1631  TwoDArrayValidator(RCP<const ValidatorType> prototypeValidator):
1632  AbstractArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType>(prototypeValidator){}
1633 
1635 
1638 
1640  virtual void validate(ParameterEntry const &entry, std::string const &paramName,
1641  std::string const &sublistName) const;
1642 
1644  const std::string getXMLTypeName() const{
1645  return "TwoDArrayValidator(" +
1646  this->getPrototype()->getXMLTypeName() + ", " +
1647  TypeNameTraits<EntryType>::name() + ")";
1648  }
1649 
1651  virtual void printDoc(std::string const &docString, std::ostream &out) const
1652  {
1653  StrUtils::printLines(out,"# ",docString);
1654  std::string toPrint;
1655  toPrint += "TwoDArrayValidator:\n";
1656  toPrint += "Prototype Validator:\n";
1657  this->getPrototype()->printDoc(toPrint, out);
1658  }
1659 
1661 
1662 };
1663 
1664 template<class ValidatorType, class EntryType>
1665 void TwoDArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType>::validate(ParameterEntry const &entry, std::string const &paramName,
1666  std::string const &sublistName) const
1667 {
1668  any anyValue = entry.getAny(true);
1669  const std::string &entryName = entry.getAny(false).typeName();
1670  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(anyValue.type() != typeid(TwoDArray<EntryType>),
1671  Exceptions::InvalidParameterType,
1672  "The \"" << paramName << "\"" <<
1673  " parameter in the \"" << sublistName <<
1674  "\" sublist is has an error." << std::endl << std::endl <<
1675  "Error: The value you entered was the wrong type." << std::endl <<
1676  "Parameter: " << paramName << std::endl <<
1677  "Type specified: " << entryName << std::endl <<
1678  "Type accepted: " << TypeNameTraits<TwoDArray<EntryType> >::name() <<
1679  std::endl << std::endl);
1680 
1681  TwoDArray<EntryType> extracted =
1682  getValue<Teuchos::TwoDArray<EntryType> >(entry);
1683  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> prototype = this->getPrototype();
1684  for(int i = 0; i<extracted.getNumRows(); ++i){
1685  for(int j = 0; j<extracted.getNumCols(); ++j){
1686  ParameterEntry dummyParameter;
1687  dummyParameter.setValue(extracted(i,j));
1688  try{
1689  prototype->validate(
1690  dummyParameter, paramName, sublistName);
1691  }
1692  catch(Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue& e){
1693  std::stringstream oss;
1694  oss << "TwoDArray Validator Exception:" << std::endl <<
1695  "Bad Index: (" << i << "," << j << ")" << std::endl << e.what();
1696  throw Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue(oss.str());
1697  }
1698  }
1699  }
1700 }
1701

1711 public:

1715 
1719  static RCP<TwoDArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> > getDummyObject();
1720 
1722 
1723 };

1725 template<class ValidatorType, class EntryType>
1726 RCP<TwoDArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> >
1727  DummyObjectGetter<TwoDArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> >::getDummyObject()
1728 {
1729  return rcp(new TwoDArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType>(
1730  DummyObjectGetter<ValidatorType>::getDummyObject()));
1731 }

1850 template<class ValidatorType, class EntryType>
1851 void ArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType>::validate(ParameterEntry const &entry, std::string const &paramName,
1852  std::string const &sublistName) const
1853 {
1854  any anyValue = entry.getAny(true);
1855  const std::string &entryName = entry.getAny(false).typeName();
1856  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(anyValue.type() != typeid(Array<EntryType>),
1857  Exceptions::InvalidParameterType,
1858  "The \"" << paramName << "\"" <<
1859  " parameter in the \"" << sublistName <<
1860  "\" sublist is has an error." << std::endl << std::endl <<
1861  "Error: The value you entered was the wrong type." << std::endl <<
1862  "Parameter: " << paramName << std::endl <<
1863  "Type specified: " << entryName << std::endl <<
1864  "Type accepted: " << TypeNameTraits<Array<EntryType> >::name() <<
1865  std::endl << std::endl);
1866 
1867  Array<EntryType> extracted =
1868  getValue<Teuchos::Array<EntryType> >(entry);
1869  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> prototype = this->getPrototype();
1870  for(int i = 0; i<extracted.size(); ++i){
1871  ParameterEntry dummyParameter;
1872  dummyParameter.setValue(extracted[i]);
1873  try{
1874  prototype->validate(
1875  dummyParameter, paramName, sublistName);
1876  }
1877  catch(Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue& e){
1878  std::stringstream oss;
1879  oss << "Array Validator Exception:" << std::endl <<
1880  "Bad Index: " << i << std::endl << e.what();
1881  throw Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue(oss.str());
1882  }
1883  }
1884 }

1995 // StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator

1999 // Constructors
2000 
2001 
2002 template<class IntegralType>
2003 StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>::StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator(
2004  ArrayView<const std::string> const& strings, std::string const& defaultParameterName
2005  ):
2006  ParameterEntryValidator(),
2007  defaultParameterName_(defaultParameterName)
2008 {
2009  typedef typename map_t::value_type val_t;
2010  for( int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(strings.size()); ++i ) {
2011  const bool unique = map_.insert( val_t( strings[i], (IntegralType)i ) ).second;
2012  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
2013  !unique, std::logic_error
2014  ,"Error, the std::string \"" << strings[i] << "\" is a duplicate for parameter \""
2015  << defaultParameterName_ << "\"."
2016  );
2017  }
2018  setValidValues(strings);
2019 }
2020 
2021 
2022 template<class IntegralType>
2023 StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>::StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator(
2024  ArrayView<const std::string> const& strings, ArrayView<const IntegralType> const& integralValues
2025  ,std::string const& defaultParameterName
2026  ):
2027  ParameterEntryValidator(),
2028  defaultParameterName_(defaultParameterName)
2029 {
2030 #ifdef TEUCHOS_DEBUG
2031  TEUCHOS_ASSERT_EQUALITY( strings.size(), integralValues.size() );
2032 #endif
2033  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
2034  strings.size() != integralValues.size(),
2035  std::logic_error,
2036  "Error, strings and integraValues must be of the same length."
2037  );
2038  typedef typename map_t::value_type val_t;
2039  for( int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(strings.size()); ++i ) {
2040  const bool unique = map_.insert( val_t( strings[i], integralValues[i] ) ).second;
2041  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
2042  !unique, std::logic_error
2043  ,"Error, the std::string \"" << strings[i] << "\" is a duplicate for parameter \""
2044  << defaultParameterName_ << "\""
2045  );
2046  }
2047  setValidValues(strings);
2048 }
2049 
2050 template<class IntegralType>
2051 StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>::StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator(
2052  ArrayView<const std::string> const& strings
2053  ,ArrayView<const std::string> const& stringsDocs
2054  ,ArrayView<const IntegralType> const& integralValues
2055  ,std::string const& defaultParameterName
2056  ):
2057  ParameterEntryValidator(),
2058  defaultParameterName_(defaultParameterName)
2059 {
2060 #ifdef TEUCHOS_DEBUG
2061  TEUCHOS_ASSERT_EQUALITY( strings.size(), stringsDocs.size() );
2062  TEUCHOS_ASSERT_EQUALITY( strings.size(), integralValues.size() );
2063 #endif
2064  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
2065  strings.size() != integralValues.size(),
2066  std::logic_error,
2067  "Error, strings and integraValues must be of the same length."
2068  );
2069  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
2070  strings.size() != stringsDocs.size(),
2071  std::logic_error,
2072  "Error, strings and stringsDocs must be of the same length."
2073  );
2074  typedef typename map_t::value_type val_t;
2075  for( int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(strings.size()); ++i ) {
2076  const bool unique = map_.insert( val_t( strings[i], integralValues[i] ) ).second;
2077  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
2078  !unique, std::logic_error
2079  ,"Error, the std::string \"" << strings[i] << "\" is a duplicate for parameter \""
2080  << defaultParameterName_ << "\""
2081  );
2082  }
2083  setValidValues(strings,&stringsDocs);
2084 }

2088 
2089 template<class IntegralType>
2090 IntegralType
2091 StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>::getIntegralValue(
2092  const std::string &str, const std::string &paramName
2093  ,const std::string &sublistName
2094  ) const
2095 {
2096  typename map_t::const_iterator itr = map_.find(str);
2097  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PURE_MSG(
2098  itr == map_.end(), Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue
2099  ,"Error, the value \"" << str << "\" is not recognized for the parameter \""
2100  << ( paramName.length() ? paramName : defaultParameterName_ ) << "\""
2101  << "\nin the sublist \"" << sublistName << "\"."
2102  << "\n\nValid values include:"
2103  << "\n {\n"
2104  << validValues_
2105  << " }"
2106  );
2107  return (*itr).second;
2108 }
2109 
2110 
2111 template<class IntegralType>
2112 IntegralType
2113 StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>::getIntegralValue(
2114  const ParameterEntry &entry, const std::string &paramName
2115  ,const std::string &sublistName, const bool activeQuery
2116  ) const
2117 {
2118  const bool validType = ( entry.getAny(activeQuery).type() == typeid(std::string) );
2119  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PURE_MSG(
2120  !validType, Exceptions::InvalidParameterType
2121  ,"Error, the parameter {paramName=\""<<(paramName.length()?paramName:defaultParameterName_)
2122  << "\",type=\""<<entry.getAny(activeQuery).typeName()<<"\"}"
2123  << "\nin the sublist \"" << sublistName << "\""
2124  << "\nhas the wrong type."
2125  << "\n\nThe correct type is \"string\"!"
2126  );
2127  const std::string
2128  &strValue = any_cast<std::string>(entry.getAny(activeQuery)); // This cast should not fail!
2129  return getIntegralValue(strValue,paramName,sublistName); // This will validate the value and throw!
2130 }
2131 
2132 
2133 template<class IntegralType>
2134 std::string
2135 StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>::getStringValue(
2136  const ParameterEntry &entry, const std::string &paramName
2137  ,const std::string &sublistName, const bool activeQuery
2138  ) const
2139 {
2140  // Validate the parameter's type and value
2141  this->getIntegralValue(entry,paramName,sublistName,activeQuery);
2142  // Return the std::string value which is now validated!
2143  return any_cast<std::string>(entry.getAny(activeQuery)); // This cast should not fail!
2144 }

2149 StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>::getIntegralValue(

2151  ,const std::string &defaultValue
2152  ) const
2153 {
2154  const std::string
2155  &strValue = paramList.get(paramName,defaultValue);
2156  return getIntegralValue(strValue,paramName,paramList.name());
2157 }

2209 template<class IntegralType>
2210 void StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>::printDoc(
2211  std::string const& docString
2212  ,std::ostream & out
2213  ) const
2214 {
2215  StrUtils::printLines(out,"# ",docString);
2216  out << "# Valid std::string values:\n";
2217  out << "# {\n";
2218  if(validStringValuesDocs_.get()) {
2219  for( int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(validStringValues_->size()); ++i ) {
2220  out << "# \"" << (*validStringValues_)[i] << "\"\n";
2221  StrUtils::printLines(out,"# ",(*validStringValuesDocs_)[i] );
2222  }
2223  }
2224  else {
2225  StrUtils::printLines(out,"# ",validValues_);
2226  // Note: Above validValues_ has for initial spaces already so indent should
2227  // be correct!
2228  }
2229  out << "# }\n";
2230 }

2253 
2254 template<class IntegralType>
2255 void StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>::setValidValues(
2256  ArrayView<const std::string> const& strings
2257  ,ArrayView<const std::string> const* stringsDocs
2258  )
2259 {
2260  validStringValues_ = rcp(new Array<std::string>(strings));
2261  if(stringsDocs)
2262  validStringValuesDocs_ = rcp(new Array<std::string>(*stringsDocs));
2263  // Here I build the list of valid values in the same order as passed in by
2264  // the client!
2265  std::ostringstream oss;
2266  for( int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(strings.size()); ++i ) {
2267  oss << " \""<<strings[i]<<"\"\n";
2268  }
2269  // Note: Above four spaces is designed for the error output above.
2270  validValues_ = oss.str();
2271 }
2272 
2273 
2274 } // namespace Teuchos

2332 template<class IntegralType>
2333 void Teuchos::setStringToIntegralParameter(
2334  std::string const& paramName,
2335  std::string const& defaultValue,
2336  std::string const& docString,
2337  ArrayView<const std::string> const& strings,
2338  ParameterList * paramList
2339  )
2340 {

2342  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT(0==paramList);
2343  paramList->set(
2344  paramName, defaultValue, docString,
2345  rcp_implicit_cast<const PEV>(
2346  stringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>(
2347  strings, paramName
2348  )
2349  )
2350  );
2351 }

2402 template<class IntegralType>
2403 IntegralType Teuchos::getIntegralValue(
2404  ParameterList const& paramList, std::string const& paramName
2405  )
2406 {
2407  const ParameterEntry &entry = paramList.getEntry(paramName);
2408  RCP<const StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> >
2409  integralValidator = getStringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>(
2410  entry, paramList, paramName
2411  );
2412  return integralValidator->getIntegralValue(
2413  entry, paramName, paramList.name(), true );
2414 }

2416 
2417 template<class IntegralType>
2418 std::string Teuchos::getStringValue(
2419  ParameterList const& paramList, std::string const& paramName
2420  )
2421 {
2422  const ParameterEntry &entry = paramList.getEntry(paramName);
2423  RCP<const StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> >
2424  integralValidator = getStringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>(
2425  entry, paramList, paramName
2426  );
2427  return integralValidator->getStringValue(
2428  entry, paramName, paramList.name(), true
2429  );
2430 }
2431 
2432 
2433 template<class IntegralType>
2434 Teuchos::RCP<const Teuchos::StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> >
2435 Teuchos::getStringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator(
2436  ParameterEntry const& entry, ParameterList const& paramList,
2437  std::string const& paramName
2438  )
2439 {
2440  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> validator = entry.validator();
2441  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PURE_MSG(
2442  is_null(validator), Exceptions::InvalidParameterType,
2443  "Error! The parameter \""<<paramName<<"\" exists\n"
2444  "in the parameter (sub)list \""<<paramList.name()<<"\"\n"
2445  "but it does not contain any validator needed to extract\n"
2446  "an integral value of type \""<<TypeNameTraits<IntegralType>::name()<<"\"!"
2447  );
2448  const RCP<const StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> > integralValidator =
2449  rcp_dynamic_cast<const StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> >(
2450  validator
2451  );
2452  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PURE_MSG(
2453  is_null(integralValidator), Exceptions::InvalidParameterType,
2454  "Error! The parameter \""<<paramName<<"\" exists\n"
2455  "in the parameter (sub)list \""<<paramList.name()<<"\"\n"
2456  "but it contains the wrong type of validator. The expected validator type\n"
2457  "is \""<<TypeNameTraits<StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> >::name()<<"\"\n"
2458  "but the contained validator type is \""<<typeName(*validator)<<"\"!"
2459  );
2460  return integralValidator;
2461 }
